Text:
Thank you Thethingie, having attained the position, you will also become a page in computing history, maybe even remembered by all in world history.  

My wife even loves you! She told me she would sleep with any man who could find his for her.  And she means it. 

She's a slender sheila, slinky and adventurous, with that special twinkle in her eye all men love. A wonderfully squeezable love with beautiful olive skin and that Greek goddess profile, she is invitingly sexy. She's especially beautiful in that enticing new bald look that goes so well with her chemotherapy. Only 73, she just loves a younger man.
